Text:
I forgot to mention, the mastering on this album is not the best with some `hot`spots making themselves known every now and then. This is not a fault of the rip, it`s the original mastering on the CD. It`s more of a subtle annoyance and shouldn`t detract from the overall enjoyment of this fantastic album.

DD2K2
Thanks for the additional input regarding sound quality. If one is sensitive to this sort of thing it can frustrating not knowing at which point in the chain such conditions are introduced.
